info.title: Activate a link in a dropdown in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstLinkInDropdown
setupScript.description: sets the state of the first disclosure button to expanded, and sets focus on the first link of the associated dropdown

user: With focus on a link in the first dropdown, activate the link.
instructions.raw: With focus on a link in the first dropdown, activate the link.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Name 'Mythical University sample page content' is conveyed
